item.description:
Yes, NHCers Alexis, Frank, & Elizabeth in concert! (what did you think I meant?). Approx. 1 hr, followed by small reception.

Since it's an evening concert, this will be one of your few chances to see them this year, since other concerts are often taking place during the workday, or they're not cheap to get into (this concert is free-will, donate whatever you feel like to the church).

See pianist Alexis Zingale & singer Frank Martignetti, performing the Hermit songs by Samuel Barber (in English), selected Greek folksongs arranged by Ravel (sung in French), and French Hornist Elizabeth Fleming in pieces for horn & piano (the Schumann Adagio & Allegro and Gilbert Vintner's Harvest Moon), and in two songs for baritone, horn and piano, by Simon Sargon. Most of the singing in the concert will be in English.

At St. Paul's Lutheran Church in Bridgeport.

Be sure your cell phone is off (vibrate-only isn't good enough).

HOST: Alexis, cell 203-747-9203. However, she won't be answering her phone starting an hour before the concert, and obviously not during it.

You can hear some of Frank at his site:
www.frankmartignetti.com

You can hear Alexis playing some Mozart at her site:
www.myspace.com/alexiszingalepianist

DIRECTIONS: For directions, click here.
item.name: Thu 10/25-Hot threesome action! In the DARK!
